DataElement.preferredName: Blood and/or Plasma Donation Occurrence Time Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator when the blood and/or plasma are donated.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._Plasma is the fluid (noncellular) portion of the circulating blood, as distinguished from the serum that is the fluid portion of the blood obtained by removal of the fibrin clot and blood cells after coagulation.:The act of giving money or materials or other items of worth._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._Plasma is the fluid (noncellular) portion of the circulating blood, as distinguished from the serum that is the fluid portion of the blood obtained by removal of the fibrin clot and blood cells after coagulation.

Concepts.definition: A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood.
Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.

Plasma is the fluid (noncellular) portion of the circulating blood, as distinguished from the serum that is the fluid portion of the blood obtained by removal of the fibrin clot and blood cells after coagulation.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of giving money or materials or other items of worth._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: The act of giving money or materials or other items of worth.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The act of giving money or materials or other items of worth._The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: On the inside; contained in._The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: On the inside; contained in._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: On the inside; contained in._A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status._One of two equal parts; a quantity corresponding to one half of the whole._A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
One of two equal parts; a quantity corresponding to one half of the whole.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual prefers or preferred not to answer.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual prefers or preferred not to answer.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident._The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: When was the last time you donated blood or plasma?
